data.text: This is a note, which supports nested inline styling for things like bold text or links.

data.answer_text: It's a simple markup language that we've added our own spin to

data.description: At Coach's New York Fashion Week show, Selena debuted a choppy fringe and new waist-length shiny brunette hair.
data.title: Selena Gomez

data.description: Another fringe debut that happened on the red carpet, we love the way Emma's matches a neat bob and dangling earrings.
data.title: Emma Roberts

data.description: A style that frames the face. Zendaya sported a new well-groomed bob with thick blunt fringe.
data.title: Zendaya

data.description: This is the stuff of fringe dreams. Elle's perfectly platinum hair has a gentle wave to it which makes for perfect bangs hair.
data.title: Elle Fanning

data.description: At the London premiere of Valerian, Cara proved that short hair can be equally creative. Adding in a fringe and fixing with a black ribbon, she donned the ultimate pixie crop.
data.title: Cara Delevingne

data.description: Texan-born Vanessa looked the picture of old-Hollywood glamour when she teamed a full fringe with a chic chignon when in the south of France.
data.title: Vanessa Moody

data.subtitle: Spring/Summer 2017
